ComicInfo.Summary:
NECESSARY EVIL CONTINUES! After a shocking betrayal, the Omega Rangers are forced to return to earth-and to reveal their identities to the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers. But can either team of Power Rangers survive the truth?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jamal Campbell | 1 | Var | Foil Variant Cover (Pink Ranger) | Goni Montes | 2 | Var | Trading Card Variant Cover (Black Omega Ranger) | Kris Anka (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | Unlocked Story Variant Cover | Dan Mora (a), Ryan Parrott (w) & Ed Dukeshire (l) | 4 |
